=== Roadmap ===

* ''Marketing'' - Materials for publicity, advocacy resources for informing and promoting, and connections with local groups https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MassachusettsTeam/Marketing
* ''Regular InstallFests'' - Every three months https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MassachusettsTeam/Events/InstallFests
* ''Information'' - Collecting helpful information as well as activism links https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MassachusettsTeam/Information
* ''Exchange Program'' - Let us borrow you computer to install Ubuntu on it for you https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MassachusettsTeam/Projects/Exchange
* ''Collaboration'' - Collaboration with other LoCos and LUGs https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MassachusettsTeam/Collaboration
* ''Donations'' - Collect hardware donations to donate to local schools and libraries with Ubuntu https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MassachusettsTeam/Donate
